fastaIO
Class TextConsumer

java.lang.Object
  fastaIO.TextConsumer

public class TextConsumer
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads a buffer and permits do more actions than a simple bufferedReader.

Version:
1.1.1
Author:
Javier Iserte

searchFor

protected int searchFor(java.lang.String string)
Returns the first appearance of 'string' in prebuffer and buffer. Warnings: this method has collateral effect changing the values of buffer and prebuffer.
